description:
We aimed to increase awareness about User Experience and Usability in Turkey, we achieved this aim by organising an international conference, UX Alive.

Conference Topics: User Experience Design, Storytelling, Information architecture, Usability, User Interface Design, Interaction Design, Content Strategy, Web Psychology, Experience Design, Service Design, experience and product marketing.

In this conference, we have 29 talks about different topics. It may take 2 weeks to complete this course.
title: UXAlive - UX Conference in Istanbul
